## blockRendering.Connection class

The base class to represent a connection and the space that it takes up on the block.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Connection extends Measurable 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [Measurable](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.measurable_class.md)

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `Connection` class.
